node.excerpt: About this webinar: Compassion can be defined as the ability to see the other person’s needs, suffering, and joy, and act upon it.  We know from research that compassion contributes to an organisation's financial resilience and retention of customers…

node.excerpt: A series of videos was created within the framework of the H2020 ReInHerit project. The aim of these videos is to raise awareness on Cultural Heritage management and to highlight issues related to the role of museums in our societies. This video is…
